Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Cyril of Alexandria:

Text.Language: Hiten nieu,/ n~te peniwt eyouab m~patriar,/c: abba Kurilloc pic~tulloc n~te pinah]: P[oic a~rih~mot nan m~pi,w e~bol n~te nennobi.
Through the prayers of our holy father the patriarch, Abba Cyril the Pillar of the Faith, O Lord grant us the forgiveness of our sins.
